titles.title: A bill to waive the statute of limitations to award the Congressional Medal of Honor to Ensign George Gay.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

bill.summary: 6/29/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the President, notwithstanding certain limitations, to award a medal of honor to a named individual for acts of valor performed by him in 1942.
